title: Drone jammed near French aircraft carrier was Russian, says Sweden
summary_full: Sweden's prime minister said it was a serious but not unexpected incident - and a "Russian way of acting that we recognise from other places".
summary_public: Sweden's prime minister said it was a serious but not unexpected incident - and a "Russian way of acting that we recognise from other places".
